abstract: New models on display at New York International Auto Show highlight how automakers have rolled out wider range of options, from compact electric vehicles to large SUVs, in order to seize on booming market; innovative crop, along with soaring profits, illustrate dramatic turnaround from recession crisis impacting industry only few years earlier.

headline.print_headline: Soaring Profits Produce Parade of New Cars
headline.main: At New York Auto Show, a Parade of New Models

keywords.value: Sports Utility Vehicles and Light Trucks
keywords.name: subject

snippet: Vehicle sales are running at a record pace, which means the car industry is willing to invest in new products and technology.
lead_paragraph: Vehicle sales are running at a record pace, which means the car industry is willing to invest in new products and technology.
